itemDescription: Scottish rugby union international and first-class cricketer (born 1949)

wikipedia_page.main: David Lauder Bell (born  (1949-04-28) 28 April 1949 in Warriston, Edinburgh) was a Scottish rugby union international and first-class cricketer.
